title: Gift Cards | McCormick & Schmick's | Seafood & Steaks
description: Give the steak and seafood lover in your life a gift card to McCormick & Schmicks. Offering both traditional and e-gift cards with personalized greetings.
sitename: McCormick & Schmick's | Seafood & Steaks in the US
cleaned_text: Gift Cards Traditional Gift Card Add a personalized greeting. No service fees or expiration dates. Send via your choice of shipping methods. [Order Traditional Gift Card](https://landrysinc.cashstar.com/store/program?fp=DBXJ6X8VN&locale=en-us) E-Gift Card Personalize with your own photo and message. No shipping charges, service fees or expiration dates. Send today or a date of your choice. Great last minute gift! [Order E-Gift Card](https://landrysinc.cashstar.com/store/program?fp=DV55HQMW&locale=en-us) Additional Information CHECK YOUR BALANCE Already have a Landry's Gift Card? [Please click here to check your balance.](https://giftcards.landrysinc.com/service/Balance) BULK GIFT CARDS For orders over $500, learn more about [bulk gift card purchases.](https://www.sertifiguidedapi.com/InSessionSigning.aspx?id=ff0fc3ec-9798-4f28-96cf-eac4bcd39804) LANDRY'S SELECT CLUB MEMBERS To receive points for online gift card purchases, please provide your Landry's Select Club number as part of the check-out process. Points will be added 5-7 business days after the request is received. Select Club points are not earned when a gift card is redeemed. Points are only earned with the purchase of a gift card or for any portion of your bill that is paid in cash or credit card. CUSTOMER SUPPORT To place an order over the phone or for questions about your online order, please contact [1.844.234.7833](tel:18442347833) (8 AM - 8 PM EST). TERMS & CONDITIONS View our [Terms and Conditions](https://www.landrysinc.com/giftcards/terms.asp) for more information on Landry's Inc. Gift Cards and our Reward Card promotions.
